transcript.text:
￼


















Pattern Design
Product Setup

4 min
overview you can integrate pattern design products for your print store just like any other standard product follow the steps below to learn how to add them to your system product configuration product details to start, navigate to the admin >> product >> printing products >> add button to add a pattern product choose the product type as ‘pattern creator’ rest all the settings remain the same as explained in the add new product docid 36z2mbsnisylwxctqmtjz section add description, and product images, choose the color palette and other settings related to the product additional options and studio events for the image and background changes in the pattern products, the admin needs to create a color additional option and bind the pattern color options events to the individual attributes from the studio events section this will show the real time effects of the price calculator assign real preview we have given the facility of configuring the preview of the pattern create module in the admin >> designer studio >> studio settings >> real preview tab for creating models and assiging products, you can refer to the real preview docid\ ycwnn3qhbxfo6qwcnhyec guide
Did this page help you?
